message: @andrewgodwin ... wondering whats your & ep.io stance on this? Is it as they describe it ... a huge commitment? also in other words, will ep.io reach the stage where such a decision has to be made?
besides, as our tech stack gets finished up on the initial write (it's taken two months!), more time for other stuff appears

Well, they had the problem of other commitments, I imagine, whereas I've made sure I have nothing past about April (and I'm already working on this mostly full-time), and Ben still hasn't tied himself into anything else after uni
Transparency is really important. Would _you_ trust a hosting company that lied? I've had that before, it's not fun.
@andrewgodwin thanks for the answsers, and for being so transparent in everything
